tool_description: Get 16 days weather forecast data - worldwide - geographical coordinates...
title: Forecast

api_list.name: Index
api_list.description: See the current API version. Here is the link to the documentation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forecast9.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecast9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: RapidApiGetForecastHourlyByCoordinates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forecast9.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/forecast/{latitude}/{longitude}/hourly/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecast9.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

forecastDate.description: Date of last update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

clouds.description: Cloudage in % (high clouds, low clouds, middle clouds)

date.description: Date, beginning of timespan, format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SSZ

class.description: Precipitation class (0: no, 1: light, 2: mid, 3: heavy)

text.description: Short weather text for calculated interpretation

nextUpdate.description: Date of next update format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

api_list.name: RapidApiGetObservationHistoryByStationId
api_list.description: Get an History object with historical information.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Show historical data from specific date

latitude.description: Value between -90 and 90. Latitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

longitude.description: Value between -180 and 180. Longitude as decimal degrees (up to 5 decimals)

api_list.name: RapidApiGetObservationHistoryByCoordinates
api_list.description: Get an Observation object with historical information.
api_list.code:
import requests
